meanings.definition: An ancient Irish alphabet consisting of a series of notches and strokes on a central line.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ogham was used for writing in Ireland.
meanings.sent2: The ogham inscriptions can still be seen on some ancient stones.
meanings.sent3: I tried to write my name in ogham, but it ended up looking like a bunch of random lines.
meanings.sent4: The ogham script is like a secret code from the past, waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: Learning about ogham made me appreciate the beauty of ancient writing systems.

meanings.definition: A script used primarily for inscriptions in the early medieval period in Ireland and Scotland.
meanings.sent1: The ogham script was commonly used on stone monuments.
meanings.sent2: Historians study the ogham inscriptions to learn about the past.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly carved my name in ogham on a tree, pretending to be an ancient scribe.
meanings.sent4: The ogham script carved on the stone seemed to whisper stories of old.
meanings.sent5: The intricate ogham carvings told tales of ancient times to those who could read them.
